DHC Eyelash Tonic (2020 formulation)

Brand: DHC

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: WATER/AQUA, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CARBOMER, AMINOMETHYL PROPANOL, PLACENTAL PROTEIN, XANTHAN GUM, ALLANTOIN, SWERTIA JAPONICA EXTRACT, SALIX ALBA (WILLOW) BARK EXTRACT, SYMPHYTUM OFFICINALE LEAF EXTRACT, NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) LEAF EXTRACT, PANAX GINSENG

ALLANTOIN, SWERTIA JAPONICA EXTRACT, SALIX ALBA (WILLOW) BARK EXTRACT, SYMPHYTUM OFFICINALE LEAF EXTRACT, NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) LEAF EXTRACT, PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
